name: THE GREAT PLAINS INSTITUTE FOR SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT, INC.
description: Institute focusing on energy policy with a goal of reducing carbon emissions.
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to carbon management, including carbon capture, removal, transport, utilization, and storage technologies.
Issues related to carbon management, including carbon capture, removal, transport, utilization, and storage technologies.
Issues related to the deployment of carbon management technologies. Issues related to geologic storage and Class VI wells.
Issues related to the implementation of the 45Q enhancements in the Inflation Reduction Act (Public Law 117-169). Issues related to the Carbon Capture and Utilization Parity Act (S.542/H.R. 1262).
Issues related to the deployment of carbon management technologies. Issues related to geologic storage and Class VI wells.
